notes: The model size increase has no impact on the collision size.
Grants the wielder unobstructed movement, allowing them to path through cliffs and trees.
The area damage is applied in 0.5-second intervals, starting 0.5 seconds after equipping the item.
abilities.description: Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.
params: The illusions gain the size and unobstructed pathing. The particle effects of the area damage appear, but deals no damage.

name: Giant's Ring
description: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.
